details: Awaliv revolving restaurant has been designed to provide its distinguished guests a wide range of local and global dishes and buffets. It has a particular and unique nature, regarding its location on the (29th) floor. We believe that it is a remarkable place with its calm atmosphere, unique view, and the variety of its food.    It would be our pleasure to welcome you daily
halls: Enjoy the feeling of the moment
hallsD: We have got the franchise rights for this international restaurant, to provide the perfect choice for guests who love grilled food, and let them enjoy a perfect vivid experience.
cafe: A rich taste touched by the sight of horizon
cafeD: The café on the (30th) floor overlooks the horizon of Taif, with a full and charming view over the city. The café serves snacks and fresh drinks throughout the day until 01:00 am.
